医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
低收入群体能幸福吗？土著见解说是的研究表明，尽管货币收入较低，但 18 个国家的土著和当地社区却表现出较高的生活满意度，这对工业化社会中观察到的财富与幸福之间的紧密联系提出了挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Can-low-venue-communities-be-happy-Indigenous-insights-say-yes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Can-low-venue-communities-be-happy-Indigenous-insights-say-yes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d4645bd-4008-4752-9fbd-a155cd86c034 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 21:09:00 -0500 Can low-income communities be happy? Indigenous insights say yes
发现激素类固醇可增强淋病细菌的耐药性研究揭示了淋病奈瑟菌（一种主要的性传播感染病原体）如何利用宿主产生的激素类固醇来增强其耐药性和存活率，揭示了细菌耐药机制与人类激素环境之间复杂的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Hormonal-steroids-found-to-boost-drug-resistance-in-gonorrea-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Hormonal-steroids-found-to-boost-drug-resistance-in-gonorrea-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66731806-d464-4dbd-b5d3-3c38b417b636 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 20:38:00 -0500 Hormonal steroids found to boost drug resistance in gonorrhea bacteria
神经假体装置成功用于回忆特定记忆来自维克森林大学医学院和南加州大学 (USC) 的科学家团队首次成功使用神经假体装置来回忆特定记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Neural-prosthetic-device-successively-used-to-recall-specific-memories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Neural-prosthetic-device-successively-used-to-recall-specific-memories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=320fc94f-bb0c-451f-9e84-fbca27e705c9 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 20:19:27 -0500 Neural prosthetic device successfully used to recall specific memories
地中海和素食饮食通过改善新型心血管疾病标志物促进心脏健康研究表明，蛋奶素食和地中海饮食都会对载脂蛋白水平和心血管疾病危险因素产生积极影响，其中地中海饮食对载脂蛋白水平有更显着的影响，特别是对于心血管疾病危险因素较少的女性和老年人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Mediterranean-and-vegetarian-diets-boost-heart-health-by-improving-novel-CVD-markers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Mediterranean-and-vegetarian-diets-boost-heart-health-by-improving-novel-CVD-markers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abb09773-bc56-4776-9a5f-ff8d2229847a Tue, 13 Feb 2024 20:17:00 -0500 Mediterranean and vegetarian diets boost heart health by improving novel CVD markers
开发新方案可快速诊断眼中风并加快护理速度西奈山纽约眼耳医院 (NYEE) 的眼科医生创建了一种新颖的方案来快速诊断眼中风并加快护理速度，以防止不可逆转的视力丧失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Novel-protocol-development-to-rapidly-diagnose-eye-中风-and-expedite-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Novel-protocol-development-to-rapidly-diagnose-eye-中风-and-expedite-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71df1300-9ae2-410e-b464-47aaa491146a Tue, 13 Feb 2024 20:15:07 -0500 Novel protocol developed to rapidly diagnose eye stroke and expedite care
研究深入了解糖尿病相关椎间盘组织损伤的潜在机制2 型糖尿病改变了椎间盘的行为，使椎间盘变得更加僵硬，并且还导致椎间盘比正常情况更早改变形状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-provides-insight-into-pottial-mechanisms-underlying-diabetes-lated-disc-tissue-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-provides-insight-into-pottial-mechanisms-underlying-diabetes-lated-disc-tissue-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08ff43f5-77af-4980-8afc-4c614de5fe5b Tue, 13 Feb 2024 20:01:34 -0500 Study provides insight into potential mechanisms underlying diabetes-related disc tissue damage
基因决定口味：研究发现遗传与食物偏好有关研究揭示了遗传变异对成人饮食偏好的显着影响，强调了遗传与食物选择之间复杂的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Genes-dictate-taste-Study-finds-genic-links-to-food-preferences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Genes-dictate-taste-Study-finds-genic-links-to-food-preferences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47dec8e6-32e5-41e1-af68-03181eb17d68 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 19:58:00 -0500 Genes dictate taste: Study finds genetic links to food preferences
研究表明 α-檀香醇对前列腺癌的发展具有化学预防作用檀香油是从檀香树（檀香树）的核心中提取的，几个世纪以来，世界各地的多种文化都将檀香油用于香水、肥皂、熏香和蜡烛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-demonstrates-chemo-preventive-properties-of-alpha-santalol-against-prostate-cancer-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Study-demonstrates-chemo-preventive-properties-of-alpha-santalol-against-prostate-cancer-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d22eb4fa-22ab-4c0f-ae95-6966e0f89c30 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 19:49:00 -0500 Study demonstrates chemo-preventive properties of alpha-santalol against prostate cancer development
科学家发现催产素如何影响动物的记忆催产素 (OXT) 是一种激素，因其对动物心理健康和情感联系的影响而闻名。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Scientists-discover-how-oxytocin-influences-memory-in-animals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Scientists-discover-how-oxytocin-influences-memory-in-animals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a23a26a-fea5-4821-a618-e632c933e15c Tue, 13 Feb 2024 19:39:05 -0500 Scientists discover how oxytocin influences memory in animals
需要采取综合方法来解决口腔健康不平等和系统性健康负担“是时候把钱花在嘴边了：解决口腔健康方面的不平等问题”是由 EFP（欧洲牙周病学联合会）委托在 Haleon 的支持下今天发布的新《经济学人影响力》白皮书。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Combined-approach-needed-to-address-oral-health-inequalities-and-systemic-health-burden.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240213/Combined-approach-needed-to-address-oral-health-inequalities-and-systemic-health-burden.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c2e6615-d138-46b9-a654-eb4dbb3b5867 Tue, 13 Feb 2024 19:35:52 -0500 Combined approach needed to address oral health inequalities and systemic health burden
